In her mission, she receives the support of a skilled getaway driver […] The post Duster Episode 2 Release Date, Time, Where to Watch appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.

excerpt: Curious to learn about the Duster Episode 2 release date and time? Here are all the details you need to know.

text: The Duster Episode 2 release date and time are right around the corner. The thriller drama series is set in the 1970s in the Southwest. It follows the journey of Nina, the FBI’s first-ever Black female agent, deciding to stop a crime ring. In her mission, she receives the support of a skilled getaway driver named Jim. The upcoming episodes intend to be an adventurous tale of emotions. Here’s all you need to know about the release date of episode 2 of Duster and how to stream it online. When is the Duster Episode 2 release date & time? The episode’s release date is May 22, 2025, and its release time is 6 PM PT and 9 PM ET in the U.S. Check out its release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern TimeMay 22, 20259 PMPacific TimeMay 22, 20256 PM Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in Duster right here. Where to watch Duster Episode 2 You can watch Duster Episode 2 via Max. Max offers a wide range of TV shows, movies, documentaries, and original programming. Fans can catch all the episodes of Duster on Max after purchasing its subscription. This is because the streaming platform does not offer any free trials. Along with Duster, it also hosts popular and fan-favorite shows like The Last of Us, House of Dragons, Game of Thrones, and Succession. What is Duster about? Duster focuses on the journey of an FBI agent and a gutsy getaway driver trying to bring down a group of criminals. The official synopsis for Duster is as follows: “In 1972, the first Black female FBI agent heads to the Southwest and recruits a gutsy getaway driver in a bold effort to take down a growing crime syndicate.”
html:
The Duster Episode 2 release date and time are right around the corner. The thriller drama series is set in the 1970s in the Southwest. It follows the journey of Nina, the FBI’s first-ever Black female agent, deciding to stop a crime ring. In her mission, she receives the support of a skilled getaway driver named Jim. The upcoming episodes intend to be an adventurous tale of emotions.

Here’s all you need to know about the release date of episode 2 of Duster and how to stream it online.

When is the Duster Episode 2 release date & time?

The episode’s release date is May 22, 2025, and its release time is 6 PM PT and 9 PM ET in the U.S.

Check out its release times in the U.S. below:

Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in Duster right here.

Where to watch Duster Episode 2

You can watch Duster Episode 2 via Max.

Max offers a wide range of TV shows, movies, documentaries, and original programming. Fans can catch all the episodes of Duster on Max after purchasing its subscription. This is because the streaming platform does not offer any free trials. Along with Duster, it also hosts popular and fan-favorite shows like The Last of Us, House of Dragons, Game of Thrones, and Succession.

What is Duster about?

Duster focuses on the journey of an FBI agent and a gutsy getaway driver trying to bring down a group of criminals.

The official synopsis for Duster is as follows:

“In 1972, the first Black female FBI agent heads to the Southwest and recruits a gutsy getaway driver in a bold effort to take down a growing crime syndicate.”
